thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com | 3 of 122
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: We ordered a fraction of what we needed for the whole project because we wanted to see the tiles before we fully committed. The tiles we ordered were on sale, so of course they were backordered when we wanted to order the remainder of what we needed. Greatmats let us order them at the sale price and gave us an accurate estimate of when we would receive the shipment. So far we love our tiles!
